ygData.subject: Back to Cybertron (Please read)
ygData.msgSnippet: Burning Hammer went on his way to help out the Alliance, when suddenly, a signal told him his ship was being activated. How did this bot break through the

------=_NextPart_000_0219_01C04221.7EF4CBA0
Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Burning Hammer went on his way to help out the Alliance, when suddenly, a s=
ignal told him his ship was being activated. How did this bot break through=
 the security systems? Burning Hammer runs towards his ship. Stronghold and=
 Blender get in the ship.

Stronghold: No security system keeps out you, Bl=
ender.

Blender: Nope, I'm mighty and awesome rolled into one.

Stronghold:=
 Whateva you say...Scamrock.

Blender: Shut up before I beat the hell out o=
f you.

Stronghold: Again with that human word, isn't it enough already tha=
t we started to be modeled after them?

Blender: No, it isn't, those humans=
 can't do nothing that we can't.

Stronghold laughs and they take off into =
the sky, heading for Cybertron. Burning Hammer arives on the scene and fire=
s into the sky, but no shots could dent the ships armor. Burning Hammer wat=
ches the ship disappear. He grumbles and heads back to the Alliance base, w=
ondering how that bot got through his defenses.

Blender: Maybe we should c=
all that little guy, tell him where we burried the treasure?

Stronghold: Y=
eah, even if his treasure was fake, the little guy was pretty cool.

Blende=
r: Treasure hidden on Prehistoric Earth? Come on!

Stronghold: Alright, cal=
l him, tell him about what we'll be doing up there and to visit us when he =
gets back.

Blender to Rizopas over commlink:Hey, kid, we're heading back t=
o Cybertron, if you ever make it back, look us up in the network, we'll be =
the SAB...Protection Agency.

Stronghold: Right on.

Rizopas' reply as he r=
etreats: Bye you guys, it's been fun, I won't forget you, you can count on =
seeing me again!

Stronghold: Sheesh, that midget annoyed us and everything=
, do you believe him?

Blender: Yah, I just hope he doesn't get killed.

St=
ronghold: Yah, whatever.

They both drink beer and head back to Cybertron.
=

Blender: Why did humans make this stuff anyway?

And so ends the story of =
Stronghold and Blender, part of my first gestalt and some of my most kickas=
s warriors. They go out in style and go home where they will make the most =
profit. Just remember the good old days when they killed their "pals" Arrow=
 and Train Wreck, or when te smoked while fighting, or when they joined Dee=
mos and killed Justice AKA Time Bomb. Never forget when they chased Rizopas=
 or threw their own brand of party with him. And I hope you've been reading=
 their story, goodbye, Stronghold and Blender, you were good characters but=
 you ran your course.......
